page.title: 19ELPHINSTONE PIGEON CLUB
page.content: EVERY MEMBER OF THE CLUB HAS A PIGEON LOFT OR A DOOCOT. IN SPRING THE BIRDS ARE PAIRED . THE YOUNG ARE RINGED AT TWO WEEKS AND TRAINED BEFORE THEY CAN RACE. THE PIGEON CLUB HUT IS IN THE MINERS' WELFARE CAR PARK. THERE ARE TEN MEMBERS ALTOGETHER. MR J.BOSWORTH IS THE CLUB SECRETARY. EVERYBODY BRINGS THEIR PIGEONS DOWN TO THE HUT AT ABOUT 7:OOPM. THEY RING THE PIGEONS THEN CHECK THE CLOCKS. WE FLY WITH EAST OF SCOTLAND FEDERATION. AT ABOUT 9:30PM THEY PUT THE PIGEONS INTO A TRANSPORTER. THE PIGEONS ARE LET AWAY EARLY IN THE MORNING OR, IF IT IS BAD WEATHER THEY ARE HELD OVER TILL THE NEXT DAY. THERE ARE MANY RACES EACH YEAR, BOTH NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL, FOR OLD AND YOUNG BIRDS. THERE IS AN ANNUAL PIGEON CLUB DANCE WHERE TROPHIES ARE PRESENTED.
